alert.note: Alert for Bay; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 7:23AM EDT until April 13 at 8:15AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southeastern Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 715 AM CDT. * At 622 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Springfield, or near Callaway, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lynn Haven, Callaway, Springfield, Hiland Park, Nixon, Bayhead, Southport, Singer Road, Recota Beach, College Station, Bayou George, Greenhead, Camp Flowers, Gainer Spring, Bennett, Youngstown, Cairo, Porter Lake, Brannonville and Vicksburg. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CDT for the Panhandle of Florida. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CDT for the Panhandle of Florida.
